channel.title: Updates on Rootwork.org
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Rootwork.org

item.title: Subscribe to Rootwork.org email updates!
item.description: I offer updates by RSS, Atom and a JF2 (JSON) feed, but email updates are the easiest! Updates are sent out periodically when new blog posts go up, but never more than once per week. No analytics or tracking pixels are used in these emails. See Rootwork.org’s privacy policy

item.title: Confirm your subscription
Farewell: You've been unsubscribed from email updates
item.description: I’ve removed your email address from the Rootwork.org email updates list, per your request. Unsubscribed by mistake, or want to sign up with a different email address? Head on over to the signup form. No hard feelings! If you have a moment, please reach out on social media and let me know why you decided to go.

item.title: Thanks for subscribing to Rootwork.org email updates!
item.description: To ensure all your updates get delivered, I suggest adding updates@rootwork.org to your contacts or address book. (You can write to me at that address too!)
